text.section: This section does not apply to a covered employee of a municipal corporation or a county who is subject to § 9-503 of this title and the dependents of those covered employees, unless the municipal corporation or county has made an election under § 9-683.6 of this subtitle.

The Commission has continuing jurisdiction to:
suspend, reallocate, or terminate payments of compensation in accordance with this part; and
reinstate payments of compensation that have been suspended or terminated under this section.
